isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION: INTRODUCTION - FUEL SYSTEM - HIGH PRESSURE

svcprocinfo.para: Fuel in the supply manifold is delivered to drillings in the cylinder head leading to the injector bores. The fuel is then pressurized by the injectors. Any excess fuel is piped from the rear of the supply manifold to the fuel tank.

svcsubproc.title: Fuel System With Horizontal Mounted Hand Primer Pump
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure i.13
for the fuel system flow on engines equipped with the horizontal mounted hand primer pump.

figure.caption: Figure i.13 Horizontal Mounted Hand Primer Pump Fuel System

svcsubproc.title: Fuel System With Vertical Mounted Hand Primer Pump
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure i.14
for the fuel system flow on engines equipped with the horizontal mounted hand primer pump.

figure.caption: Figure i.14 Vertical Mounted Hand Primer Pump Fuel System
